flawed_nl_solution:
Yes RSVP responses are 200 x 83% = <<200*83*0.01=166>>166 guests.
No RSVP responses are 200 x 9% = <<200*9*0.01=18>>18 guests.
Guests who responded are 166 + 18 = <<166+18=181>>181.
Guests who did not respond at all are 200 - 181 = <<200-181=19>>19.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 184.0, not 181.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
